name: early-bird

effect.black_white: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1. If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.
effect.black_2_white_2: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1. If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.

short_effect: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.

flavor_text.black_white: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.
